channel.title: 718 Dungeoneering shop
channel.description: my dungeoneering shop it based on tickets players kill npc's to get dung xp and a set amount of tokens the problem is when a player trys to buy a chaotic with their tokens and they have gold in their money pouch it wont let them but if they have 0 coins in their pouch it lets them is their a way to have the shop bypass the money pouch and take directly from the tokens? if so please reply i would greatly appreciate it

item.title: 718 Dungeoneering shop
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

38 1464 false - Dungeoneering Shop - 18349 1000 18351 1000 18353 1000 18355 1000 18357 1000 18359 1000 18363 1000 18361 1000 18335 1000 18337 1000 19669 1000

38># of shop||1464 ticket #. so my dung shop accept 1464 =archery ticket when they want to buy items on my dung shop

hope this one helps
